80z, I've seen your prompt answer to my requests. I appreciate your efforts so very much, you're amazing. Cheers.

80zforever, you do fantastic work thanks a lot!  Here's a challenge for you ...  I'm tempted to say "I bet you've never heard of them" but judging from your extensive collection I'm guessing you've seen 'em all.

Canadian Band: Bob's Your Uncle
1986 	Bob's Your Uncle
1990 	Tale of Two Legs
1993 	Cages

fizdude, Bob's Your Uncle was part of the local punk/wave bands in Vancouver. Since I am from Vancouver too, I know them pretty well. The lead singer Sook-Yin was kind of active in the 90s. If I am remembering correctly she released one CD. Now I think I have their 1986 EP but need to double check.

I knew you'd be on the case!  Thanks for your quick response.  It would be great to hear anything from them again.  My searches have turned up nada.  I have their albums on tape (haha) in a box in Winnipeg or Wimperpeg as we call it during frosty season.  Currently living in Seoul, Korea - your collections have been keeping us sane and we thank you for that.

thank you thank you thank you!!!!!
